tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor was extremely friendly and explained very well about pregnancy and the complications associated.She explained about regular checkups, role of iron and folic acid supplementation,vaccinations,importance of treatment of hypothyroidism,warning signs during pregnancy.The doctor also explained about genetic conditions and the screening tests that need to be done.She was extremely courteous,down to earth and answered all our questions.
I strongly recommend her to anyone looking for a good obstetrician and gynaecologist.

review: Dr. Tanuja is a highly professional and experienced gynaecologist. I was going through a high risk pregnancy and she made sure to provide me with the best treatment available. She was very responsive to my questions both in messages and in person. She would always calmly clarify my doubts. I would say she is one of the best gynaecologist and I have happily delivered a baby girl through her guidance and I will highly recommend her.
